basics.name: Jane Doe
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: Experienced software engineer with 8+ years of expertise in building scalable web applications. Specialized in full-stack development with a strong focus on cloud architecture and microservices. Proven track record of leading teams and delivering high-quality software solutions.

work.summary: Lead engineer for cloud infrastructure team, managing 5 developers
highlights: Led migration of monolithic application to microservices architecture, reducing deployment time by 60%
Implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions and AWS, improving delivery frequency from monthly to daily releases
Mentored 3 junior developers, resulting in 2 promotions within 18 months
Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through optimization of AWS resources and implementation of auto-scaling

work.summary: Core team member responsible for building the main product from scratch
highlights: Built RESTful API serving 100K+ daily active users with 99.9% uptime
Developed responsive web application using Vue.js and TypeScript
Implemented real-time features using WebSockets and Redis pub/sub
Established testing practices achieving 85% code coverage

work.summary: Junior developer working on enterprise web applications
highlights: Developed features for customer portal using Angular and Spring Boot
Collaborated with QA team to implement automated testing suite
Participated in Agile ceremonies and contributed to sprint planning

projects.name: Open Source Monitoring Tool
projects.description: Built a distributed monitoring system for microservices using Go and React. The tool provides real-time metrics, alerting, and performance visualization.
